00019 #include "CDFFileWriter.h"
00020 #include "CDFData.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 CDFFileWriter::CDFFileWriter(CDFData &p) 
00025 {
00026         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00027         contentsPos = 0;
00028         WriteHeaders();
00029         dataGroupWriter = 0;
00030 
00031         //skip ahead to the position of the first probe set dataSet
00032         int32_t probes = p.GetProbeSetCnt();
00033         int32_t size = probes * ((MAX_CDF_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH * 2) + 8); 
00034         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(size);
00035 
00036         // Set the file position of the next DataGroup
00037         writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0).UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00038 }
00039 
00040 CDFFileWriter::~CDFFileWriter() 
00041 {
00042         delete writer;
00043         if(dataGroupWriter != 0) delete dataGroupWriter;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void CDFFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00047 {
00048         writer->WriteHeader();
00049         DataGroupWriter* dataGroupWriter = &writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00050         dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00051         contentsWriter = &dataGroupWriter->GetDataSetWriter(0);
00052         contentsWriter->WriteHeader();
00053         contentsPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00054 }
00055 
00056 CDFProbeSetWriter* CDFFileWriter::CreateProbeSetWriter(const std::wstring& xdaBlockName,
00057                                                                                                                                                                                                                         u_int8_t unitType,
00058                                                                                                                                                                                                                         u_int8_t direction,
00059                                                                                                                                                                                                                         u_int32_t atoms,
00060                                                                                                                                                                                                                         u_int32_t cells,
00061                                                                                                                                                                                                                         u_int32_t probeSetNumber,
00062                                                                                                                                                                                                                         u_int8_t cellsPerAtom)
00063 {
00064         //create data dataSet writer
00065         probeSetPlaneHdr.Clear();
00066         probeSetPlaneHdr.SetName(xdaBlockName);
00067 
00068         ParameterNameValueType t1;
00069         t1.SetName(CDF_UNIT_TYPE);
00070         t1.SetValueUInt8(unitType);
00071         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddNameValParam(t1);
00072 
00073         ParameterNameValueType t2;
00074         t2.SetName(CDF_DIRECTION);
00075         t2.SetValueUInt8(direction);
00076         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddNameValParam(t2);
00077 
00078         ParameterNameValueType t3;
00079         t3.SetName(CDF_ATOMS);
00080         t3.SetValueUInt32(atoms);
00081         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddNameValParam(t3);
00082 
00083         ParameterNameValueType t4;
00084         t4.SetName(CDF_CELLS);
00085         t4.SetValueUInt32(cells);
00086         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddNameValParam(t4);
00087 
00088         ParameterNameValueType t5;
00089         t5.SetName(CDF_PROBE_SET_NUMBER);
00090         t5.SetValueUInt32(probeSetNumber);
00091         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddNameValParam(t5);
00092 
00093         ParameterNameValueType t6;
00094         t6.SetName(CDF_CELLS_PER_ATOM);
00095         t6.SetValueUInt8(cellsPerAtom);
00096         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddNameValParam(t6);
00097 
00098         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00099         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddUShortColumn(L"");
00100         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddUIntColumn(L"");
00101         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddUIntColumn(L"");
00102         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddByteColumn(L"");
00103         probeSetPlaneHdr.AddByteColumn(L"");
00104 
00105         // Set the number of rows
00106         // cells should be the same as atoms*cellPerAtom
00107         probeSetPlaneHdr.SetRowCnt(cells);      
00108 
00109         return new CDFProbeSetWriter(dataGroupWriter->CreateDataSetWriter(probeSetPlaneHdr));
00110 }
00111 
00112 void CDFFileWriter::OpenDataGroup(const std::wstring& probeSetName, int dataSetCnt)
00113 {
00114         DataGroupHeader dataGroup(probeSetName);
00115         for(int i = 0; i < dataSetCnt; i++)
00116         {
00117                 DataSetHeader dsh;
00118                 dataGroup.AddDataSetHdr(dsh);
00119         }
00120         dataGroupWriter = writer->CreateDataGroupWriter(dataGroup);
00121         WriteContentsEntry(probeSetName);
00122         dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00123 }
00124 
00125 void CDFFileWriter::CloseDataGroup()
00126 {
00127         dataGroupWriter->Close();
00128         delete dataGroupWriter;
00129         dataGroupWriter = 0;
00130 }
00131 
00132 void CDFFileWriter::WriteContentsEntry(const std::wstring& probeSetName)
00133 {
00134         u_int32_t currentPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00135         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(contentsPos);
00136         contentsWriter->Write(probeSetName, MAX_CDF_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00137         contentsWriter->Write(currentPos);
00138         contentsPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00139         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(currentPos);
00140 }
